heading: car of the century
subheading: the ford model t, the car that made automobiles affordable for the masses, was voted "car of the century" on saturday by an international jury of automotive journalists. coming in at a close second was the british mini, followed by the citroen ds 19. the car beloved by the beat generation, the volkswagen beetle, came in fourth. henry ford, father of the model t, was named entrepreneur of the century.
author: wired staff
text: the ford model t, the car that made automobiles affordable for the masses, was voted "car of the century" on saturday by an international jury of automotive journalists. coming in at a close second was the british mini, followed by the citroen ds 19. the car beloved by the beat generation, the volkswagen beetle, came in fourth. henry ford, father of the model t, was named entrepreneur of the century.
